member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION
member.summary: Specifies how to access a resource used in a depth-stencil view.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The resource will be accessed according to its type as determined from the actual instance this enumeration is paired with when the depth-stencil view is created.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 1D texture.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 1D textures.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D texture.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture with multisampling.

member.name: D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION.D3D10_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMSARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures with multisampling.
